entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins and a friend of Harry Potter. He carried a barn owl over to the window.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry Potter and one of the main characters in the story.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins and a friend of Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's best friends and a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as someone who might be involved in something serious, but it is not clear what that is.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: owlery
entities.description: The Owlery is a place where owls are kept.

entities.name: joke shop
entities.description: The joke shop is an idea that George and Fred have come up with.

relationships.description: George carried the barn owl over to the window.
Ron is involved in George and Fred's joke shop idea.
Harry thinks that Crouch might be related to something serious, but it is not clear what that is.
Hermione mentions Dumbledore as someone who would know if there was something serious going on.
